body:
Would it be worth adding a scale factor `alpha`?
Also, would we want to keep a [similar signature to standard `addmm` function](https://github.com/torch/torch7/blob/master/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L805)?
body_html:
Would it be worth adding a scale factor alpha?
Also, would we want to keep a similar signature to standard addmm function?
body_text:
Would it be worth adding a scale factor alpha?
Also, would we want to keep a similar signature to standard addmm function?
